overview: When the beautiful and cannibalistic Venus' pod breaks its orbit and lands on Earth, she escapes and before long is back to her murderous ways. It's Det. Marlene Cooper's job to stop Venus before the body count gets too high. Cooper gets help from Lovebone, a police officer from Venus' planet, who is sent to lend a hand.  "  She's from outta this world!!  "
title: Venus
